ComicInfo.Penciller: Ernie Chan,Luis Dominguez,Noly Panaligan,Ruben Yandoc,Ernie Chua,Rubeny,Ernie Chua,Rubeny,Noly Panaligan
ComicInfo.Summary:
Flee to Your Grave: Reese tries to kill his parter, Professor Travers, and succeeds only in turning him into a monster.
No Sleep for the Dead: When Corliss Norton defies his wife's dying wish her ghost returns to set things straight.
A Change for the Hearse!: Lew Duryea is on the run from a loan shark.
ComicInfo.Writer: Carl Wessler,George Kashdan,Leo Dorfman,George Kashdan,Leo Dorfman,Carl Wessler
ComicInfo.Title: Flee to Your Grave; No Sleep for the Dead; A Change for the Hearse!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
